title: Lp went pooooof
body: So I got into champion select and the most dreadful thing happened, a clash of worlds. I didn't want to disappoint my team by leaving it afk so I decided to do the brave thing and leave champion select so I'll lose the 3 lp. After a long day out I came back home to catch up on my missed league adventures and BAM lost like 10lp for ditching champ select? da fok -.-

replies.body: First dodge is 3 LP and 6-minute queue timer. Subsequent dodges in a certain time period are 10 LP and 35-minute queue timer.

yea mate, only dodge if its really really needed.

3lp dodges are on a 24-30hour period.

Good luck .
